captions.text: I'm sure remember what today means
It's been a year since we met
If we've changed since then
it's our love that has grown bigger
All winter, I've been making
a red sweater for you, which you'll get today
It's warm just like your heart
I hope it reminds you of me
Couples on the streets
Songs playing all night
They're all like pretty gifts blessing us two
White snow is falling
Falling from the sky
Love falls on top of our hearts linked together
Should I lean into your arms and say it first?
I love you who feels everything about me
I hope our love last forever
Tonight, which seems like it'll last forever
Fall in love, like the snow piling, our time is piling too
One step, two steps, our footsteps together
They twinkle like paintings on the white snow
I've been preparing for this moment, I love you
A year ago today, when we first met
It snowed white like it is now
My nose turned red from the cold
You laughed, making fun of me
The candle is glistening
Maybe I should show how I feel now
I am happier than anyone on Earth, when I'm with you
White snow is falling, falling from the sky
Love falls on top of our hearts linked together
Should I lean into your arms and say it first?
You who feels everything about me
I can hear your wish, the sky hears it too
I'll be making the same wish tonight
Even when time passes, our love
I prey for it to last just as it is

comments.text:
too much complain from so called "fans".. well I too is waiting for DSP 
girls to debut.. that's since PURETTY is still promoting in Japan.. now 
that they have the baby kara, i'm still waiting.. i know that DSP had a 
special thing to do with them.. y not just wait and let's see... we don't 
know why Somin still with DSP when she can actually be with others.. she 
might see herself debuting in DSP, we don't know.. so just wait since other 
baby kara's members where added just recently and they needed to be train 
for a bit longer.. Rainbow as a group is not active, but individually they 
are, same goes to A-jax.. and also to Oh jung hyuk.. compare before i think 
DSP is doing better now.. when ss501 still with them, it's just SS501 who 
makes money.. now every artist does.. only that Kara earned the most.. ﻿
